titles.title: A bill to amend the Food and Nutrition Act of 2008 to make certain multivitamin-mineral dietary supplements eligible for purchase with supplemental nutrition assistance program benefits, and for other purposes.
SNAP Vitamin and Mineral Improvement Act of 2019
SNAP Vitamin and Mineral Improvement Act of 2019
SNAP Vitamin and Mineral Improvement Act of 2019

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.
